title.rendered: Weimar Pictures Wins Coveted Gold for Title Design at the 44th Annual Telly Awards

content.rendered:
BURBANK, CALIFORNIA, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, June 1, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Weimar Pictures, a renowned high-end production company specializing in motion graphics, 3D animation, visual effects, and branding, is thrilled to announce its exceptional success at the 44th Annual Telly Awards. In a momentous achievement, Weimar Pictures has been awarded the coveted gold in the category of Title Design for Television for the first time in its history.

With a total of seven wins, Weimar Pictures continues to exemplify its unwavering commitment to excellence in film, digital advertising and television production.

Among the prestigious awards received by Weimar Pictures are:

HBO Max: Baketopia – Main Title
2023 TELLY AWARDS GOLD for Craft-Title Design for Television
2023 TELLY AWARDS SILVER for Craft-Use of 3D Animation for Television

The Atlantic Festival 2021- GFX Package
2023 TELLY AWARDS GOLD for Craft-Motion Graphics / Design for Online
2023 TELLY AWARDS BRONZE for Craft-Art Direction for Online

Disney’s Magic Bake-Off – Graphics Package
2023 TELLY AWARDS SILVER for Craft-Use of Graphics for Television
2023 TELLY AWARDS SILVER for Craft-Motion Graphics / Design for Television

The Boys Season 3: Supersonic – “Rock My Kiss” Music Video
2023 TELLY AWARDS BRONZE for Craft-Visual Effects for Television

Renowned for its expertise in high-end graphics, 3D animation, and branding, Weimar Pictures has once again been recognized by the esteemed Telly Awards. The Telly Awards, renowned for honoring excellence in the video and television industry, boasts a panel of judges composed of leaders from prestigious organizations such as Adobe, BBC World Service, Netflix, and National Geographic Society, among others.

Robert Uncles, chief creative officer and spokesperson for Weimar Pictures, expressed profound gratitude for the recognition. “We are immensely honored to receive these accolades at the 44th Annual Telly Awards. They serve as a testament to the exceptional talent and dedication of our team at Weimar Pictures. We remain committed to pushing the boundaries of our craft and will continue to create visually captivating content that resonates with audiences worldwide.”

The 44th Annual Telly Awards introduced new categories that celebrate the positive impact of video and emerging technologies. winners announcement caps a year-long celebration of creators and talent who truly stand out during a time when the ubiquity of screens brings more clutter than quality into our lives. These are the creators and innovators who spotlight diverse voices, who are building a more sustainable industry, and who break through the static with their creativity.

In function of this, a series of new categories were introduced to reflect and celebrate ways in which video is being used as a force for good and the ways in which emerging technologies are pushing the boundaries of innovation. New categories this season included Virtual Art Direction, Use of Motion Capture, and Digital Environments alongside new honors in Pro Bono, CSR, and Video Journalism to celebrate ethical, philanthropic, and educational work.

This was a record breaking year with nearly 13,000 entries from across the globe and top video and television content producers such as Airbnb, Audible, BET Networks/BET Digital, BritBox, Disney, FEMA, Gaumont, Golden State Warriors, MediaMonks, NASA, National Geographic Society, Netflix, Paramount, PBS Digital Studios and more.

To view the complete list of winners of the 44th Annual Telly Awards, visit www.tellyawards.com/winners.

About Weimar Pictures

Weimar Pictures is an acclaimed high-end production company specializing in graphics, 3D animation, and branding. With a team of exceptionally talented artists, Weimar Pictures consistently delivers innovative and visually stunning productions that captivate audiences worldwide.

For media inquiries, please contact Robert Uncles at info@weimarpictures.com.

Robert Uncles
Weimar Pictures
info@weimarpictures.com
Visit us on social media:
Facebook
Instagram

You just read:

News Provided By

June 01, 2023, 16:49 GMT
